articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Huichon Electrical Complex and Power Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Huichon Electrical Complex and Power Station
Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Huichon Youth Electrical Complex and the construction site of the Huichon Power Station.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Huichon Youth Electrical Complex.
					
					 He looked round production processes and saw newly-made electrical products to learn in detail about production there. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction that the workers of the complex have modernized and scientized its production processes on the basis of cutting-edge technology in a short span of time and actively developed new technology, thus bringing about a signal turn in the production of electrical products. 
					
					 He highly praised the officials, workers and technicians of the complex for their admirable feats, noting that it is a signal success that they produced latest type electrical goods in a brief span of time by their own efforts and with their own technology in hearty response to the Party's slogan calling for pushing back the frontiers of science and technology on all the fronts and advancing faster to attain higher goals. 
					
					 He advanced the important tasks to be carried out by the complex to keep the production going at a high rate. 
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the dam construction site at Huichon Power Station No. 2.
					
					 Being briefed on the construction at its final stage before a map showing a panoramic view of the power station, he climbed the dam towering high between mountains. He walked round the construction site to learn in detail about the project.
					
					 Making the rounds of construction sites alive with a high-pitched labor drive, he was greatly pleased with the rapid progress made in the project.
					
					 The devoted drive of the builders of the power station including soldier-builders who created the Huichon speed, a new Chollima speed, opened a bright prospect for finishing the huge construction before 2012, he said, extending warm salute to all the soldier builders working hard in the revolutionary soldier spirit and the spirit of fortitude. 
					
					 Thanks to the heroic struggle of the soldier builders, the power station will be completed before long, causing a large man-made lake to appear, he said, once again earnestly calling on them to make a courageous last charge to bring earlier the day of completion.
					
					 Appreciating pencil drawings and other literary and art pieces created by soldier-builders in the stirring construction site, he heard beautiful stories about them.
					
					 He indicated important tasks to serve as guidelines for completing the power station earlier than scheduled.
					
					 In order to meet rapidly growing demand for electricity, it is necessary to increase power production and, at the same time, build more power stations in different parts of the country, he said, adding that it is of particularly weighty importance to finish the above-said power station with high capacity in a short span of time. 
					
					 He underscored the need to wage a great offensive by mobilizing the whole party and army and all the people in order to wind up the construction of the power station before the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 He stressed the need to pay particular attention to providing the builders with good living conditions including lodging so that they may not feel any slightest inconvenience.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, and Kim Phyong Hae, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, and Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of Belarus
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of Belarus
Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Aleksandr Grigoriyevich Lukashenko upon his reelection as President of the Republic of Belarus.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished him success in his work for defending the country's sovereignty and achieving socio-economic development and the welfare of the people.

articles.title: Vietnam's Army Day Marked
articles.content:
Vietnam's Army Day Marked
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Le Van Cu, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK, and Nguyen Van Lich, military attache of his embassy, co-hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Wednesday on the occasion of army day of Vietnam. 
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, generals and other officers of the KPA and officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and military attaches of embassies of various countries here.
					
					 Present there were staff members of the Vietnamese embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Lays Wreath to Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Lays Wreath to Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Foreign diplomats laid a wreath before the bust of Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Wednesday on the occasion of her 93rd birth anniversary. 
					 The officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations observed a moment's silence with deep reverence for Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero and woman commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The economic and commercial councilors corps here laid bouquets and paid tribute on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Chinese Family
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Chinese Family
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from a Chinese family Wednesday.
					 It came from the family of Zhang Weihua, anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr. 
					
					 It was presented on the occasions of Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: Wreath to Kim Jong Suk from Chinese Family
articles.content:
Wreath to Kim Jong Suk from Chinese Family 
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- A Chinese family sent a wreath to the bust of Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on the occasion of her 93rd birth anniversary.
					 The Chinese is Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong who is related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China.
					
					 The wreath was laid before the bust of the anti-Japanese war hero on Mt. Taesong on Wednesday.

articles.title: Foreigners Mark DPRK Anniversaries
articles.content:
Foreigners Mark DPRK Anniversaries
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Foreigners here visited several places Wednesday on the occasions of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The military attaches corps visited the Revolutionary Museum of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces while the economic and commercial councilors corps the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site. 
					
					 They looked round the historic relics and mementoes, being briefed that the three commanders of Mt. Paektu performed immortal feats in the army building.
					
					 The officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here visited the E-library of Kim Il Sung University on the same day.

articles.title: New Documentary Film Shown
articles.content:
New Documentary Film Shown
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- New documentary film "Under the Guidance of the Brilliant Commander" (25) was screened at the People's Palace of Culture on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					 The audience included senior state officials, the chairman of a friendly party, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					 The film deals with the fact that over 50 years since he started his Songun revolutionary leadership Kim Jong Il has shared will and lot with the revolutionary comrades who devote their all to building up the nation's military capability.
					
					 It tells that the Korean revolution shines with the great history of comradeship, showing the world of noble obligation of Kim Jong Il giving a high appreciation of the feats by many revolutionary comrades, who had always uphold the party with arms, and providing them eternal life.

articles.title: Workers and Unions Marks Anniversary of KPA Supreme Commander
articles.content:
Workers and Unions Marks Anniversary of KPA Supreme Commander
Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea separately held meetings at the Central Hall of Workers and the Women's Hall on Wednesday on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and officials and members of the said federation and union. 
					
					They said that Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the KPA marked a historic event of weighty significance in developing the KPA and accomplishing the Juche cause.
					
					 They stressed that having Kim Jong Il at the top post of the revolutionary armed forces made it possible for the DPRK to give steady continuity to the glorious history and tradition of the Korean revolution which started and emerged victorious with arms for independence and steadily advance the socialist cause. 
					
					 An art performance was given by the Workers' Art Squad of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and a concert by members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea to vow loyalty on the same day to commemorate the anniversaries.

articles.title: Youth and Student's National Solo Vocal and Recital Contest Held
articles.content:
Youth and Student's National Solo Vocal and Recital Contest Held
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- A national vocal solo and solo recital contest of youth and students took place at the Central Youth Hall from December 15 to 21 on the occasions of the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The contest brought together at least 300 youth and students selected from the contests held here and in various provinces, cities and counties. 
					
					 The participants fully displayed the artistic skills they cultivated through their mass cultural and art activities. 
					
					 They successfully represented revolutionary songs with rich voice and played various musical instruments with refined skills. 
					
					 An art performance was given by the successful entrants on Wednesday.

articles.title: Sinpha Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Sinpha Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- The Sinpha Revolutionary Site is visited by an endless stream of the soldiers of the Korean People's Army and people from all walks of life on the occasion of the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 A total of 100,000 people have visited the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites in Ryanggang Province since the outset of the year. They included participants in winter season study tours, working people and school youth and children who visited there on the occasion of the significant anniversary in December.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and flowers before the statue of Kim Jong Suk and paid tribute to her.
					
					 They visited the Singalpha Ferry, places for preserving aid materials and secret liaison, Sokjon Tailor Shop, Kwangson Photo Studio, etc. which she frequented to guide revolutionary organizations in the area of Singalpha.

articles.title: Woman Commander of Mt. Paektu Produced by Korea
articles.content:
Woman Commander of Mt. Paektu Produced by Korea
Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- When December comes, the Korean people and servicepersons are recollecting the brilliant life of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk who performed immortal feats in the history of Songun revolution of Juche.
					She joined the Korean People's Revolutionary Army in the Chechangzi guerrilla zone in September Juche 24 (1935).
					
					Less than 100 servicepersons of the KPRA and members of the anti-Japanese self-defence corps and young volunteers' corps defeated more than ten thousand-strong Japanese "punitive" force in the battle for the defence of the Chechangzi guerrilla zone in October that year.
					
					She imbued the fighters with faith that they were sure to win any battle if they fought by the combat method taught by President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					She told them not to expose the positions of the KPRA to the reckless shelling and bombing of the enemy, thereby contributing to the victory in the battle.
					
					Upon hearing the news that the position of members of the young volunteers' corps was in danger while the battle was going on, she lost no time to rush there together with a veteran fighter. She instructed the fighters there to shower stones upon the enemy troops coming in attack. 
					
					Hit hard by a shower of stones, they fell en masse and the rest ran helter-skelter.
					
					When fighters ran out of ammunition, she together with other women fighters carried it. 
					
					This battle bore witness to her extraordinary military wisdom, disposition, courage and braveness.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts American Lawmakers' Outbursts
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts American Lawmakers' Outbursts 
Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Ros-Lehtinen, member of the U.S. House of Representatives, called for taking "strong counteraction" and relisting the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism," while terming it a "rogue regime".
					 This is intolerable as it is malignant vituperation against the dignified DPRK and its system. 
					
					 Ros, man representing the U.S. conservative hard-liners, is human scum as he earned ill-fame as an anti-communist fanatic.
					
					 He is a political illiterate ignorant of the background against which the nuclear issue cropped up on the Korean Peninsula and the processes to settle it. 
					
					 It is natural to hear such rubbish from him.
					
					 What should not go unnoticed, however, is that he let loose vituperation against the DPRK soon after he became chairman of the House International Relations Committee.
					
					 It is quite clear that he would escalate the anti-DPRK campaign in Congress and political arena.
					
					 In fact, such moves have come to the fore.
					
					 Senator John McCain said that he would make new Congress commencing its work next year immediately relist the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism" and apply financial and other sanctions against it.
					
					 The U.S. State Department, echoing the outpourings of conservative forces, clarified that it would tighten sanctions against illegal financial activities of the DPRK in a recent four-year diplomatic progress review report.
					
					 The above-said reckless remarks made by the U.S. against the DPRK, raising a hue and cry over the military clash on Yonphyong Island and its nuclear activities for peaceful purposes are despicable conspiratorial acts which can be committed only by those who stoop to any infamy to meet their political and military purposes. 
					
					 It was not "a sort of reward" granted to the DPRK that the preceding U.S. administration delisted the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism." It was done on the principle of "action for action" stipulated in the September 19 joint statement on the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 No one has a ground to say this or that about it. 
					
					 The U.S. conservative hardliners, however, are crying out for relisting the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism". This is a despicable bid to check the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon Ros and his group.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Follow Precedent of International Community
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Follow Precedent of International Community
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- The international community recently strongly urged the Japanese authorities to take an immediate legal step for redressing their past crimes. 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observed this in a signed commentary.
					
					 This reflects not only the vehement condemnation of the Japanese authorities for persistently dodging a state apology and reparation for their past crimes but the unanimous will of the international community to force them to make apology and reparation for those crimes under any circumstances, the commentary noted, and went on: 
					
					 Japan, a war criminal state of the Second World War and the perpetrator of hideous crimes against humanity, has neither admitted the monstrous crimes in the past nor apologized for them. 
					
					 On the contrary, the Japanese authorities openly visited "Yasukuni Shrine", a symbol of militarism, whitewashing their history of aggression.
					
					 Japan's brazen-faced approach toward those crimes goes to prove that the Japanese reactionaries are obsessed with the idea of "advantages" of "Yamato nation" and extreme national chauvinism and do not have even the slightest will to completely break with its past crime-woven history. 
					
					 The Japanese authorities' persistent evasion of state responsibility for the hideous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against humanity in the past and their increased efforts to dodge apology and reparation for them would only invite hatred and rebuff from the international community. 
					
					 Japan would be well advised to follow the precedent of the international community heading for full settlement of past wrongs.

articles.title: Actions to Judge Dictatorial Regime Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions to Judge Dictatorial Regime Called for in S. Korea 
Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Labor Party (DLP) of south Korea called for launching a nation-wide movement to judge the puppet dictatorial regime on December 16. 
					 The DLP accused the "Grand National Party" and the "government" of railroading the budget for the new year through the "National Assembly" and turning it into a theater of rowdyism. 
					
					 It made it clear that their rash actions once again clearly indicated their intention to head for dictatorship, trying no longer to reach an understanding with the people.
					
					 The DLP underscored the need to form a pan-national movement organization and launch strong and sustainable actions to judge the Lee Myung Bak regime in solidarity with the people of all circles including political parties, civic and public and religious organizations except the GNP.

articles.title: Young Koreans' Night Event Held in South Africa
articles.content:
Young Koreans' Night Event Held in South Africa
						
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- The DPRK youth and students delegation held the "night yearning for Kim Jong Il" at the DPRK embassy in South Africa on December 17. 
					 The event started with song "Where Are You, Dear General?" The performers sang songs like "Thanks to Fatherly General" and "Our General Is Best".
					
					 They hardened their firm will to demonstrate the revolutionary spirit and the heroic stamina of Korean youth grown up under the care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, hardly repressing their yearnings for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The delegation is on a visit to South Africa to attend the 17th World Festival of Youth and Students.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported at International Forum
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported at International Forum
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- An international forum supporting the Korean people and youth in their struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country took place at an exhibition held in South Africa on December 17. 
					 Present there were youth and student delegations of different countries including that from the DPRK attending the 17th World Festival of Youth and Students, delegates of international and regional organizations and the DPRK ambassador to the country. 
					
					 A keynote report was made by the general secretary of the World Federation of Democratic Youth to be followed by a report of Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, who headed the delegation of the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were also made there. 
					
					 They accused the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak regime of their reckless military provocations and war moves. They also expressed full support and solidarity with the Korean people and youth in their struggle to achieve the reunification of the country and build a thriving nation. 
					
					 An appeal to the world progressive youth and students was read out. 
					
					A letter to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted there.
					
					 An art performance was given by members of the DPRK delegation and a demonstration presentation was made by South African Taekwon-Do practitioners.

articles.title: International Solidarity for Korea's Reunification Called for
articles.content:
International Solidarity for Korea's Reunification Called for
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- An appeal to the world progressive youth and students was read out at an international solidarity forum for supporting the struggle of the Korean people and youth for the independent and peaceful reunification. The forum was held on December 17 as an event of the 17th world festival of youth and students.
					 The attendants of the forum indicted the U.S. for its hideous act of keeping the Korean nation divided into two and inflicting untold misfortune and pain upon it and strongly demanded the U.S. troops immediately pull out of the Korean Peninsula, according to the appeal.
					
					 They were unanimous in that the three principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity laid down by President Kim Il Sung serve as immutable guidelines for reunifying the country.  They also spoke highly of General Secretary Kim Jong Il for ushering in the new era of independent reunification with his Songun politics.
					
					 We appreciate that thanks to the historic north-south summit and the publication of the June 15 joint declaration ten years ago, the north-south relations turned to those guided by the spirit of "By our nation itself" from those of distrust and confrontation and signal changes were brought to the Korean nation's history of the reunification movement. We were firmly convinced that the only way to put an end to the history of north-south confrontation and reunify the country is to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it.
					
					 The appeal called on the world progressive youth and students to wage a widespread international solidarity movement for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 It called for escalating the international pressure on the U.S. to pull out of south Korea and support the Korean people's struggle to establish lasting peace-keeping mechanism on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The appeal called for dealing sledge blows at the U.S. and the Lee authorities as they cooked up such thrice-cursed hideous farce as the warship sinking case, pushing the inter-Korean relations into total collapse, and perpetrated such reckless military provocation as the Yonphyong Island shelling incident, driving the situation on the peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 It underscored the need to wage a more dynamic international solidarity movement for the purpose of positively supporting the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as the most fair and aboveboard programme for reunification and making sure that they are steadily carried out. 
					
					 The appeal expressed the conviction that the youth and students and all other peace-loving people the world over would become louder in their voices expressing international solidarity with the Korean people's just struggle against the moves of the U.S. and its followers for a war of aggression.

articles.title: Songun Politics Praised by Finnish Politician
articles.content:
Songun Politics Praised by Finnish Politician 
Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) - A Finnish politician released a statement on Dec. 16 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					Hannu Harju, chairman of the Central Council of the Communist Workers' Party of Finland for the Peace and Socialism, said that the KPA has grown to be an army strong in idea and faith and a matchless army of justice. It provides a sure guarantee not only for the socialist society but for peace and security on the Korean Peninsula under his wise leadership, he added.
					
					Kim Jong Il has performed undying exploits by developing the DPRK into an indestructible socialist bulwark and training the KPA as a defender of justice and peace under the uplifted banner of Songun. This is lauded not only by the Korean people but the world progressives, the statement said.
					
					Our party fully supports Kim Jong Il's independent politics, the Songun politics and is firmly convinced that the army and people of the DPRK will win only victories in the drive for building a thriving socialist nation and on the front against imperialism, the statement added.

articles.title: Demolition of Concrete Wall Demanded in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Demolition of Concrete Wall Demanded in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy released a statement on Dec. 14 in demand of the demolition of the concrete wall extending in the areas of the south side on the Korean Peninsula.
					 It diametrically runs counter to the trend of the times that the concrete wall built in south Korea 31 years ago is still standing, said the statement.
					
					 It is due to this wall that the Koreans of a homogenous nation is not allowed to visit each other as they please and mistrust and confrontation between the north and the south of Korea are festering, it added.
					
					 There is nowhere in the world such wall symbolic of confrontation between compatriots as the one in Korea. 
					
					 The adoption of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration deprived the concrete wall, a factor of division and confrontation, of any justification to exist any longer, the statement noted. It strongly demanded the south Korean authorities pull down it as early as possible.

articles.title: DPRK Anniversaries Celebrated in Ethiopia and Peru
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversaries Celebrated in Ethiopia and Peru
Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Ethiopia and Peru released bulletins on Dec. 5 and 15 on the occasions of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea issued bulletin titled "24th of December in the DPRK." It carried articles captioned "Supreme Commander and soldiers" and "Loving care for future."
					
					Articles said 24th of December is a significant day for the Korean people, giving a detailed account of the facts that Kim Jong Il, while inspecting units of the KPA, showed profound loving care and benevolence for soldiers. They introduced in detail the undying feats Kim Jong Suk performed by devoting herself to the country's future.
					
					The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism in its bulletin carried articles under various titles. 
					
					The article titled "Songun politics and great contribution made by Marshal Kim Jong Il" said that socialist Korea proved in practice that Songun politics provides a guarantee for peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: DPRK Anniversaries Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversaries Marked Abroad 
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Russia, a meeting, a photo exhibition and a film show in Bangladesh and a lecture and a photo exhibition in Finland and seminars in Mexico, Democratic Congo and Tanzania from Dec. 11 to 14.
					They were held on the occasions of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					
					 Displayed were photos on the undying Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Suk. 
					
					 Films shown included "Reply of DPRK".
					
					 Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the KPA marked a great event for not only the Korean people but progressive mankind, said Yuri Vanin, vice-chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DRPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il trained the KPA as an invincible army which no formidable enemy dare provoke, said M. Gamrul Huda, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, also praised the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, stressing that Kim Jong Suk is a true patriot and indomitable fighter who devoted herself to the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Songun politics of Kim Jong Il serves as an almighty treasured sword, said Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism.
					
					 Francis F. Lyimo, chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups, noted that the KPA is demonstrating its might as an invincible army thanks to Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Russia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Given Wide Publicity
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Given Wide Publicity 
Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" has been widely studied and distributed in more than 90 countries and regions over the last 15 years since it was published.
					 The work was brought out in booklet by publishing houses of various countries. They include the Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House of Russia, the Canta Clara Publishing House of Venezuela, the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico and the Futra Publishing House of the Czech Republic. 
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the U.S. Group for the Study of Songun Politics and the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea carried the work in their bulletins or posted it on their Internet homepages. 
					
					 Various countries and regions of the world including Russia, Mongolia, Egypt, Zimbabwe and Bulgaria conducted in various forms and by diverse methods the activities to study and learn from Kim Jong Il's noble moral obligation dealt with by his work.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige complejo y obra de central electrica de Huichon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige complejo y obra de central electrica de Huichon
						
Pyongyang, 22 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo Electrico Juventud de Huichon y el campo de construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon.
					Ante todo, el Dirigente visito el Complejo Electrico Juventud de Huichon.
					
					Tras recorrer los procesos de produccion, se entero en detalles de la fabricacion viendo los productos electricos recien hechos.
					
					Expreso gran satisfaccion de que los obreros de la empresa hayan realizado en un corto plazo la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de los procesos de produccion basados en la tecnologia de punta, desarrollado nuevas tecnologias y registrado un viraje trascendental en la produccion de productos electricos.
					
					Es un gran exito el que en acato a la consigna del partido de conquistar en todos los frentes la tecnologia de punta y lograr saltos mas altos y mas rapidos, los funcionarios, los obreros y los tecnicos de la empresa hayan elaborado en un corto plazo por sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas los productos electricos ultramodernos, dijo y evaluo de altos sus meritos orgullosos. 
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan para normalizar la produccion en un alto nivel.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente estuvo en el campo de la obra del dique de la Central Hidroelectrica No.2 de Huichon, que se halla en etapa final.
					
					Despues de escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano, subio al dique levantado majestuosamente entre altas montanas y recorrio el lugar de construccion haciendo conocimiento detallado de la marcha de la obra.
					
					Al ver los lugares de obra que hacen recordar un campo de batalla, se mostro muy satisfecho de la velocidad vertiginosa de la construccion. Gracias a la lucha abnegada de los militares y otros constructores de la central electrica, creadores de nueva velocidad de Chollima, la de Huichon, se abrio firme perspectiva capaz de terminarla antes de 2012, senalo y envio el cordial saludo a todos los constructores militares que hacen ingentes esfuerzos poniendo de pleno manifiesto el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y el de la lucha tenaz. 
					
					  Destaco que merced a la lucha heroica de los constructores militares, se construira la Central Hidroelectrica No. 2 de Huichon y aparecera un gran lago artificial y volvio a exhortar encarecidamente a librar gran campana para adelantar el dia de la victoria.
					
					  Vio las obras literarias y artisticas como bosquejos creados por los constructores militares en el campo de construccion y escucho muchos episodios hermosos aparecidos en el proceso de la construccion.
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para terminar con anticipacion la construccion de la central hidroelectrica.
					
					  Parra satisfacer las necesidades de electricidad que se aumentan rapidamente es preciso incrementar la produccion electrica y construir por doquier muchas centrales electricas, indico y prosiguio que tiene suma importancia terminar en corto plazo dicha central con alta capacidad generadora.
					
					  Apunto que para completar la construccion de esta central antes del 100? aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo, movilizados, deben librar una gran batalla ofensiva.
					
					  Subrayo que deben prestar particular atencion a las condiciones de hospedaje, comida y vida de los constructores para que no sintieran ninguna incomodidad.
					
					  Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del Buro Politico (BP) y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su y Kim Phyong Hae, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, jefes de departamento del CDN.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige el Combinado de Maquinaria Ryonha de Huichon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige el Combinado de Maquinaria Ryonha de Huichon
Pyongyang, 22 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Combinado de Maquinaria Ryonha de Huichon, convertido en la fabrica modelo del siglo XXI.
					Recorrio los lugares de montaje y de elaboracion mediante la tecnologia CNC, recien acondicionados, y otros lugares de la fabrica, donde se entero en detalles del estado de la renovacion tecnica y de produccion.
					
					Al ver el interior de la fabrica y las alineadas maquinas herramientas CNC de nuevo tipo, se mostro muy satisfecho de que se haya logrado el desarrollo vertiginoso en la renovacion tecnica diciendo que la fabrica se ha transformado completamente durante unos meces. 
					
					Los obreros de la fabrica, con ardiente patriotismo y la voluntad tenaz, llevaron al nivel mundial la industria mecanica del pais, subrayo y agrego que ellos tomaron la supremacia en la tecnologia CNC y se ponen en la delantera de la tecnologia sofisticada, lo cual es otra gran victoria alcanzada en la epoca del Songun.
					
					Asevero que nuestra practica revolucionaria muestra que solo los fuertes en la ideologia y la conviccion pueden desarrollar y conquistar la tecnologia de punta e hizo hincapie en que tales hombres son patriotas e indoblegables combatientes que hacen brillar la idea Juche no con las palabras sino con sus actividades.
					
					"Que conquisten la cumbre de la tecnologia de punta!", consigna presentada por el Partido, sirve de la bandera combativa que impulsa con vigor la jucheanizacion, la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de la economia nacional, senalo y apunto que todos los dominios y todas las unidades deben acelerar con dinamismo la modernizacion basada en la ciencia y tecnica ultramodernas.
					
					La fabrica debe avanzar incesantemente hacia la meta cientifica y tecnica mas alta basandose en el exito de haber aplicado la tecnologia CNC, prosiguio.
					
					Fijo la meta a ser conquistada en un corto plazo e indico concretamente el rumbo y los remedios para el particular. 
					
					Pudimos desarrollar con audacia la tecnologia CNC y llegamos a fabricar cualesquier instalaciones de gran eficiencia y con alta velocidad, precision y facultades intelectuales, ratifico y enfatizo la necesidad de seguir prestando profunda atencion a llevar la industria de maquinas herramientas a la etapa mas alta.
					
					Los obreros de la fabrica deben registrar un auge en la produccion de maquinas herramientas poniendo de pleno manifiesto la abnegacion patriotica y continuar con brillantez la orgullosa tradicion de lucha de haber producido en el pasado 10 mil maquinas herramientas, puntualizo.
					
					El partido deposita gran esperanza en el Combinado de Maquinaria Ryonha de Huichon, dijo y expreso conviccion de que la fabrica inventara mucho mas maquinas herramientas CNC de buen funcionamiento y hara gran aporte a consolidar la base industrial del pais. 
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del Buro Politico (BP) y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su y Kim Phyong Hae, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, jefes de departamento del CDN.

articles.title: Actos de festejo de obreros y gremiales y de mujeres
articles.content:
Actos de festejo de obreros y gremiales y de mujeres
Pyongyang, 22 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 19o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tuvieron lugar el dia 22 en la Casa Central de Obreros y la Casa de Mujeres los actos festivos de los obreros y miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea y de las miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea, respectivamente. 
					Participaron el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, y otros cuadros, los funcionarios y miembros de la FGSC y la UMDC.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el nombramiento del Dirigente como Comandante Supremo del EPC fue el evento historico de suma importancia en el desarrollo del EPC y en el cumplimiento de la causa del Juche. 
					
					Gracias a tener al General Insigne al puesto cimero de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, se heredan con firmeza la orgullosa historia y tradiciones de la revolucion coreana iniciada y avanzada victoriosamente con las armas de independencia y se lleva adelante la causa socialista.
					
					El mismo dia, se ofrecieron la funcion del Grupo Artistico Central de Obreros de la FGSC y las canciones de fidelidad de las miembros de la UDMC dedicados a la citada efemeride y el 93o aniversario del natalicio de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: Tribuna internacional de solidaridad con la lucha del pueblo coreano
articles.content:
Tribuna internacional de solidaridad con la lucha del pueblo coreano
						
Pyongyang, 22 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en Sudafrica la tribuna internacional de solidaridad con la lucha del pueblo, la juventud y los estudiantes de Corea por la reunificacion independiente y pacifica del pais.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes las delegaciones de la juventud y los estudiantes de Corea y otros paises, los delegados de organizaciones internacionales y regionales, participantes en el 17 Festival Mundial de la Juventud y los Estudiantes, asi como  el embajador coreano en Sudafrica.
					
					  El secretario general de la Federacion Mundial de la Juventud Democratica pronuncio el discurso de base y el jefe de la delegacion coreana Ri Yong Chol, primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, presento el informe.
					
					  Acto seguido, hubo discursos.
					
					  Los oradores revelaron y condenaron las aventureras provocaciones militares y las maniobras guerreristas de Estados Unidos y la banda de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  Expresaron el apoyo y la solidaridad con la lucha del pueblo y la juventud coreana por reunificar el pais y construir una gran potencia prospera.
					
					  En la ocasion se dio lectura al llamamiento enviado a la juventud y los estudiantes progresistas del mundo y se aprobo el mensaje de felicitacion al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Ademas, se realizaron la funcion artistica de la delegacion coreana y la actuacion modelo de los taekwondoistas sudafricanos.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto de delegacion coreana al festival mundial
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto de delegacion coreana al festival mundial
Pyongyang, 22 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Los miembros de la delegacion de jovenes y estudiantes de Corea, participantes en el XVII Festival Mundial de la Juventud y los Estudiantes, organizaron el dia 17 el encuentro "Noche de anoranza al General" en la embajada coreana en Sudafrica.
					  En el acto iniciado con la interpretacion de la cancion "?Donde esta el querido General?" -conocida como obra maestra- los participantes cantaron "Gracias, General padre" y "Nuestro General es el mejor" y otras canciones.
					
					  Los oradores dijeron que durante el festival anoran cada dia mas al Dirigente y expresaron su firme determinacion de demostrar plenamente el espiritu revolucionario y el impetu heroico de los jovenes coreanos crecidos en el regazo de los Grandes Hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu.
